item.title: [Diablo 4] Ancestral Unique Item [Mother's Embrace] Info
item.description: [Ancestral Unique Ring] Mother’s Embrace link 925 Item Power +10.0% Resistance to All Elements +10.0% Shadow Resistance +[47 - 65] All Stats +[10.5 - 15.0]% Attack Speed +[6.0 - 8.0]% Critical Strike Chance +[6.0 - 8.0]% Lucky Hit Chance Requires Level: 80 If a Core Skill hits 4 or more enemies, [30 - 60]% of the Resource cost is refunded. “Every tome, every scroll, every book in this temple produces the same answer.

item.title: [Diablo 4] Ancestral Unique Item [Tal Rasha's Iridescent Loop] Info
item.description: [Ancestral Unique Ring] Tal Rasha’s Iridescent Loop link 925 Item Power +10.0% Resistance to All Elements +4.0% Resistance to All Elements +[6.0 - 8.0]% Lucky Hit Chance +[57.0 - 75.0]% Non-Physical Damage 12.0% Cooldown Reduction +[2 - 3] to Potent Warding (Sorcerer Only) Requires Level: 80 For each type of Elemental damage you deal, gain [10.0 - 20.0]%[x] incresed damage for 4 seconds, up to [40.0 - 80.0]%[x]. Dealing Elemental damage refreshes all bonuses.
